question.title: How to properly call static method in java from jni
question.body:
I am trying to pass some initialization values from jni to java.

I have been able locate and correctly call the java method from my JNILib Init function but when I try to call it from a different function, the app crashes because it seems that I do not have the current class, method and env pointers. I have tried to store these pointers from my init function to some global variables but this didn't work.

I am trying to call

env->CallStaticVoidMethod (class, method, jstr);

from a void function different than the jnilibInit function and I am not sure how to retain the pointers.

I haven't been able to find the class or the method from this function.
